stage_data.stage_sub_heading: Choose how you would like to create your account

help_data.heading: Hi there!
help_data.subheading: I’m Gluru the bot. Creating an account is easy and free forever.

stage_data.stage_sub_heading: Connect some data sources so we can get started

help_data.heading: Ok great now let’s connect your sources!
help_data.subheading: Connecting your data to Gluru is easy. Indexing time varies depending on how many files you have.

stage_data.stage_sub_heading: Choose how Gluru will handle your email attachments

help_data.heading: Next, decide how Gluru should handle your email attachments
help_data.subheading: Gluru can save your email attachments to multiple destinations like Dropbox and Google Drive

stage_data.stage_sub_heading: Add the people you would like to connect with

help_data.heading: Great job! Lets add some favourite people.
help_data.subheading: Selecting favourite people will allow gluru to make notifications meaningful.

help_data.heading: Ok let’s create a team and invite some people.
help_data.subheading: Name your team, apply settings and most importantly invite some people.

items.item_name: Super long meeting name that will be truncated for sure even on fairly large screens resolutions
items.item_attendees: Jason Smith, Amy Tan, Han Solo, Tony Stark

files.file_summary: I really would love to get together.
